com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums

Interface IUserDetailsProvider

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ICustomUserDetailsProvider, IUserManagementService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SampleLDAPUserDetailsProvider

    @MXBean
public interface IUserDetailsProvider
    Definition of the UMS's User Details Provider interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createUser(User user, Set<String> groupNames)
      Creates a new user with the supplied details.
      void createUserGroup(UserGroup userGroup, Set<String> userNames)
      Creates a new user group with the supplied details.
      void deleteUser(String userName)
      Deletes the user with the given user name.
      void deleteUserGroup(String groupName)
      Deletes the user group with the given user name.
      Set<UserGroup> getAllUserGroups()
      Returns all the user groups currently defined.
      Set<User> getAllUsers()
      Returns all the users currently defined.
      Set<UserGroup> getGroupsOfUser(String userName)
      Returns the set of groups that a user with the given user name belongs to.
      User getUser(String userName)
      Returns the user with the given user name.
      UserGroup getUserGroup(String groupName)
      Returns the user group with the given user name.
      Set<User> getUsersInGroup(String groupName)
      Returns the set of users belonging to the user group with the given name.
      void setGroupsOfUser(String userName, Set<String> groupNames)
      Sets the groups that a user with the given user name belongs to.
      void setUsersInGroup(String groupName, Set<String> userNames)
      Sets the users belonging to the user group with the given name.
      void updateUser(User user)
      Updates an existing user with the supplied details.
      void updateUserGroup(UserGroup userGroup)
      Updates an existing user group with the supplied details.

      Checks if the user with the given user name exists.

      • getAllUsers

        Set<User> getAllUsers()
        Returns all the users currently defined.
        Returns:
        the set of users currently defined

      • userExists

        boolean userExists(String userName)
        Checks if the user with the given user name exists.
        Parameters:
        userName - a user's name
        Returns:
        true if this user exists, false otherwise

      • getUser

        User getUser(String userName)
      throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException
        Returns the user with the given user name.
        Parameters:
        userName - a user's name
        Returns:
        the corresponding User if such a user exists
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException - thrown to indicate that there is no user with the given user name

      • createUser

        void createUser(User user,
                Set<String> groupNames)
         throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.UserAlreadyExistsException,
                com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException
        Creates a new user with the supplied details.
        Parameters:
        user - describes the new user to be created
        groupNames - the names of the groups that this new user should be added to
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.UserAlreadyExistsException - if a user with the same user name already exists
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException - if one of the supplied group names does not represent an existing group

      • deleteUser

        void deleteUser(String userName)
         throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException
        Deletes the user with the given user name.
        Parameters:
        userName - a user's name
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException - thrown to indicate that there is no user with the given user name

      • updateUser

        void updateUser(User user)
         throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException
        Updates an existing user with the supplied details.
        Parameters:
        user - describes the user to be updated
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException - if there is no user matching the given user name

      • getAllUserGroups

        Returns:
        true if this user group exists, false otherwise

      • createUserGroup

        void createUserGroup(UserGroup userGroup,
                     Set<String> userNames)
              throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.UserGroupAlreadyExistsException,
                     com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException
        Creates a new user group with the supplied details.
        Parameters:
        userGroup - describes the new user group to be created
        userNames - the names of the users that should be added to this group
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.UserGroupAlreadyExistsException - if a user group with the same user name already exists
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException - if one of the supplied user names does not represent an existing user

        void updateUserGroup(UserGroup userGroup)
              throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException
        Updates an existing user group with the supplied details.
        Parameters:
        userGroup - describes the user group to be updated
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException - thrown to indicate that there is no user group with the given name

        Parameters:
        userName - a user's name
        Returns:
        the corresponding set of UserGroups if such a user exists
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException - thrown to indicate that there is no user with the given name

      • setGroupsOfUser

        void setGroupsOfUser(String userName,
                     Set<String> groupNames)
              throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException,
                     com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException
        Sets the groups that a user with the given user name belongs to.
        Parameters:
        userName - the name of a user
        groupNames - the names of the groups that this user should belong to
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException - if there is no user matching the given user name
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException - if one of the supplied group names does not represent an existing group

      • setUsersInGroup

        void setUsersInGroup(String groupName,
                     Set<String> userNames)
              throws com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException,
                     com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException
        Sets the users belonging to the user group with the given name.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the name of a group of users
        userNames - the names of the users that should belong to that group
        Throws:
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserGroupException - thrown to indicate that there is no user group with the given name
        com.camerontec.catalys.mis.ums.NoSuchUserException - if one of the supplied user names does not represent an existing user
